tweets.text: The Otter Estuary Restoration should be brilliant, but it is quickly becoming a disaster! Tree & vegetation cover removal from 4th May is appalling bad practice for nesting birds, regardless of dormice. Time to stop. @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice https://t.co/oTzDbjCBof

The Darent is flowing freely again through the restored channel in Central Park, Dartford. 

The Grand Opening was a big day! Read all about it here: https://t.co/1LL3E5hsV3

Thanks to everyone who worked so hard on this project. @welovedartford @EnvAgencySE @VeoliaUK @cbecUK https://t.co/hIOLKjW3nL
It would be great to get some answers @BritGeoSurvey @AffinityWater @thameswater @HMWTBadger @GroundwaterMike @EnvAgency https://t.co/DGCBUR8MSM

@fayedavies @StinkStopthe @Regenerate_SOT too right , we have to get it closed for the sake of our children as much as our own health .@EnvAgency take note we will not be satisfied one bit until that place is closed down .

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Thanks for the update are you still here? The smell has got exponentially bad in the past hour after being fine all day. My girlfriend is 39wks pregnant and we both feel sick with bad headaches - all happened in past 1hr

So @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Please tell me, If I hit someone once a day and the pain of that assault is transient and brief, does it not count If I do it once a day, every day for a week, a month, a year, two years, three years?
#stopthestink
The authorities playing Russian roulette with our health, flabbergasted @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/Ct2QxulSuH
@fayedavies @tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA We’ll be camped outside Parliament in tents by that point!
@fayedavies @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA God Help Us. Xx

@tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Well if it lasts until 2026.... all the minutes, hours, and days mesh into one. If we live that long #StopTheStink

@shandy_defender @EnvAgencyYNE @theoutdoorcity Really impressive, saw a massive stag the other day at Lady Canning’s too. 

Excuse the poor photo… taken on an iPhone from about 75meters away. https://t.co/WOg5xuNWY0

tweets.text: @MacleodVal @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids Me neither, would be a miracle! #stopthestink
Another night of stench in Thistleberry #WalleysQuarry  woke us up at 01:15am. Can’t see this being fixed by tomorrow! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids

Things I thought I’d never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ….

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It’s really nice to see nature so close to urban centres….. it’s called @theoutdoorcity for a reason 🙌 https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT
Landfill gases filling the house again last night. Everywhere stinks. Hubby woke up feeling dizzy. Usual reporting to Env Agency and Council. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids

It is 2.30am and the stench that is @RedIndustries2 landfill Whalley's Quarry is permeating our whole flat. This is an environment disaster, a major public and mental health risk. Awake again, and both of us have work tom. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency #StopTheStink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Lack of progress? The deadline is tomorrow #stopthestink

The final #CitizenshipEveningSchool session this evening on the Climate Emergency. Massive thanks to @slowtheflow_UK’s Bede Mullen, @ScottAPatient @OnnMel @JustGaiaHX’s Natalie Denby + @EnvAgencyYNE’s Adrian Gill. Thanks to all the students for taking part, it’s been a pleasure! https://t.co/Bz7aCRUlmZ

tweets.text:
4/5 We’ve been speaking regularly but it was good to meet up with @AaronBell4NUL today. 

@EnvAgencyMids primary focus for #WalleysQuarry is @RedIndustries2 reducing odour so I was able to reassure him on behalf of his constituents that’s our priority. https://t.co/1zieoKZPsc

https://t.co/AepnYD2UqD
I live a mile from the landfill site at #WalleysQuarry, & despite what @EnvAgencyMids & @PHE_uk would have you think, I can confirm that it absolutely chuffing stinks! 💩💩💩
Please help us to #StopTheStink
House engulfed again, how much more can we take! We need the April figures ASAP @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @EnvAgency https://t.co/sCJ63WAUB8

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What progress? It’s not getting any better, we are meant to believe that by midnight tomorrow this will of gone away? & then we have 3 more cells to go through? Enough is enough we want fresh air to enjoy our homes

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Right this minute I am locked in a bedroom with air purifier, fan blowing, bottled water, paracetamol, and no intention if leaving my bedroom even for a pee. Sounds like fun. I am 64. I have sore eyes. I have a headache. My nose is swollen.THAT IS THE REALITY 2.5 MILES AWAY.

Just join our Facebook group https://t.co/vgsxPIkUK4 and you will see post after post,night after night of residents begging for clean air and struggling with their health. You don’t want to see the truth. #stopthestink

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @maricaoneill @EnvAgencyMids Why is it only now your listening? This has gone on for years for us, for years we have been told it’s nothing that we’re imagining it. I don’t imagine been woke up at 3am choking on the air I have to breathe to stay alive, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 That’s got to be one magic layer of plastic and soil to substantially reduce these odours. It’s completely off the scale tonight. #stopthestink

@MonicaHone @RussellB1ggs @markwilkinson1 @FriendsRib @AffinityWater This water source - which is a located on the way to Widford - turn left before CPL Distribution and go up the road to what I think was Brakespeare Manor.  Been dug out- natural sring, so clear and blue - water going out to a channel into farmland? #AffinityWater https://t.co/ojfDL0SJz2

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The fumes tonight are off the scale in Westlands, they’re so strong you can smell them through the purifier, this is one of the worst nights we’ve ever had so far. For gods sake woman, do something a LOT more aggressive to STOP this! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids We’ve asked you to meet face to face countless times. We’ve asked for action. We’ve called, emailed, protested... only now do you make a statement. I only hope your own family are never subjected to living conditions like this. We are helpless and overwhelmed with the stench.

@philmackie @joe9tee @BBCr4today @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews @bbc5live Thanks for the coverage! It’s toxic, an @EnvAgencyMids & @PHE_uk disaster that’s getting worse by the day the nausea, the sort throats, the breathing issues @PHE_uk desperately need to step up along with @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency it’s out of control @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @EnvAgency Air quality reports released today showing @RedIndustries2 Walley’s Quarry Landfill consistently & massively breaching WHO health and nuisance guideline levels👇Sign the petition to ensure this does not happen ever again in the UK #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/bLpwh9eYa2
Always great to see past river restorations we have completed looking great. Completed in conjuction with @bossingtonest8 and @EnvAgency in 2018. https://t.co/jVz4eMm4Rb

tweets.text: Dr Scott -  a lone local hero with more balls than @JamesBevanEA  of the @EnvAgency & Richard Harling of @PHE_uk put together. Total respect for the man & will be writing to thank him @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/K5xsKzKU6b
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Actions not words!

@ChildrensComm do you think this is fair on our children ? Is there anyway you can help our children enjoy their childhood ? @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_uk  aren’t doing anything . @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/6kNlAY8ajO
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Hear from residents?! We’ve been trying to get your to listen since 2018 @StinkStopthe

We're continuing to support our partners @shropsfire @WMerciaPolice @HighwaysWMIDS @TelfordWrekin @PHE_WestMids with the fire at a former waste site in Wellington #Telford 

Our officers are also monitoring the water quality downstream of the fire for impacts on the environment https://t.co/ENwOSBKpoz

@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @theJeremyVine @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 It’s such a shame the air quality report yet again says in essence we’re overreacting . @EnvAgency you’re pathetic , @PHE_uk you’re also an absolute disgrace .

@ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Your priority shouldn’t be reducing its odour, it should be shutting it down.  I heard you say on the ITV report that this would lead to even greater problems as there would be no operator there to manage emissions. Yet the EA has closed other landfill sites in the past.
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Keeps pollution profitable under @DefraGovUK  aka @pow_rebecca  control?

tweets.text:
2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today 👇 and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG

5/5 Lastly: 🙏 to those who kindly came to share experiences of living with this odour.

I’ve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL You don’t need to visit the town to hear from us residents. Just join our Facebook group https://t.co/vgsxPIkUK4 and you will see post after post,night after night of residents begging for clean air and struggling with their health. You don’t want to see the truth. #stopthestink

tweets.text:
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What IS the progress? It absolutely stinks again. Now in all directions. 

So? Answers are needed. We have now had enough. Actions not PR. Actions not pictures. Whatever you are doing IS NOT working. You are destroying my ability to work. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Try living here you twat.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL 'REALLY PLEASED'? - Sorry, are you nose blind? It stinks, it has all day. Could you live here and be forced to breathe this polluting, poisonous stink?You are not listening to GPs, the local hospital, or the residents. We need action, and by tonight's stink, it isn't happening.

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL You make it sound like a nice day out sightseeing or a garden party not an environmental and health crisis. Put it into special measures, get someone experienced and reputable to cap it off and shut it down. Fresh air is a basic human right but to us it's a luxury.

tweets.text: So @RedIndustries2 you state that from your talks with the @EnvAgency that 'odours' have reduced (quoted from @ITVCentral tonight). This proves you to be the liars you are. Get out of our town you are not welcome @StinkStopthe https://t.co/T6EuwhIzsn

@tykerobinson @skinoverbone @networkrail @EnvAgency A local group of which I am part of are working on such a plan. I agree it’s a mess down there a combination of a number of landowners some of which have little regard for the local community and it’s environment

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The odour is getting worse and worse, night by night and has been since 2018. This is not your priority. It can’t be. If this if you working as hard as you can, then you are inept. This is out of control. #stopthestink

How is this allowed in our beautiful natural environment here in Hayle #Cornwall ?? This is unacceptable ! Someone needs to be held account ! Someone is getting a lot of back handed money for sand shifting. https://t.co/ak9xazoyhy
